childMdx.excerpt: Welcome. We begin immediately. Both the  The Blue Book  and  Living The Blue Book  organise knowledge in a definite journey from beginning…
Your  [[love]]  is  [[light]]  focused in my  [[heart]] , that first messenger at last arrived to take the signed will from this bewildered…
You greeted me, brother, looked me in both eyes, then pulled me to your chest of  [[light]] , fulfilling His first and final promise:   No…
There is no obligation but clear deliverance, darkly lit, of how we danced in a scented daze, this knight and queen in checkered space…
"The decree is for the truth to be experienced by all humankind, if  [[not]]  in this life, then after death." - Shaykh Fadhlalla Haeri…
Can you be  [[nothing]] special when the help of God comes and wake up in the predawn  [[light]] with no idea of who it was that spoke and…
Morning and time again to sing as earth sinks into light and the dawn chorus.   It's grey and cold, but today the birds are truly beautiful…
To be with the meaning of sunrise, simply, until the very source of what it is to hasten to this far horizon as it sinks into gold is given…
